text: (Napiye) nir parkkavillaiya? Niccayamaka allah ippumiyilullavarraiyum, avan kattalaiyal katalil cellum kappalkalaiyum unkalukku vacappatuttit tantirukkinran, tan anumatiyinri pumiyin mitu vanam viluntu vitatavaru avan tatuttum kontirukkiran. Niccayamaka allah manitarkal mitu mikka irakkamum, anpum ullavan
